channel.title: Animating problem D: D: D:!
channel.description: ooommmg k so i got the plugin and i messed around with the blob dude for like 5 hours, i made him kick things XD, anyway, when i go to animate a custom, the boxes used to animate a piece of the armour or person w.e dont show up, is there something i have to add when making it that allows it to show up in the animating section etc? atm im trying to animate ags spec and sgs spec b.c they go corrupt in my server, and uhhh yeee, nothing shows up to animate it so yeee, any help would be nice esp. if i have to do something on datmaker etc. and im asking to be spoon fed of what to do btw, b.c i like it the simple way :)

item.title: Animating problem D: D: D:!
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

yyeee b.c i guess when i was adding ele the ele model was the same as ags and sgs models and it overwrote them so now when i spec i get ele legs and ele top above my head… lol :/…

Read full topic

item.title: Animating problem D: D: D:!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Umm, the datmaker only animates 2 thinks sucessfully without glitches that i know of. Swords and Shields (i have been told others have glitches). It will be in CJ’s tut though. Try looking in his tut, but as for that special i have no idea on animations for it. (it should have been pre-done)

Read full topic

item.title: Animating problem D: D: D:!
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

ye but most models im trying to add are bout 35k+ in cache which need animating, like corp beast, etc. uhm is there a link i can get to give me the dat maker to animate and if possible a tiny rought tut on how to animate? :)

Read full topic

item.title: Animating problem D: D: D:!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Well, ill be honest i only know how to animate through the datmaker. Lately though i have been just concentrating on my modeling skills.

ONTOPIC - I would think that the specials would be pre-animated when added to your client. I dont see why they dont work correctly. On my server they work, just no emotes for em. All i did was take the model from RSMV and add it though, but i dont remember the ID’s

Read full topic
